@TurnText:
'TOUCHDOWN!' The voice comes from the TV. Your Fantasy Football team just lost completely and utterly. You knew that football players often have early onset brain degradation, but why did it have to happen to your guys instead of the other guys? Your 'friends' gather around you. The loser's punishment is to record and post a political rant for the internet. What do you make it about?
1) Octopus rights
2) Reducing AI risks
3) Housing costs
4) Achieving immortality

A lady runs up to you with a baby. Well, I want to say baby, but its more of a toddler. He gives you a scowl. 'Please kiss my baby, Oh Wise Leader!'
1) Kiss the baby.
2) Bribe the baby. 
3) Fight the baby. 
4) Ignore the baby

Mr. Monopoly pulls you aside. 'You know, I have... resources. I could help you win this thing. But you know, things don't come for free.' 1) Shake his hand. 'You can count on me.' \n2) 'I'm no sellout'

You're asked to give a toast at a gathering of supporters. On what do you give it? 
1) How smart and kind everyone present is 
2) How awesome your family is 
3) Airplane food 
4) Refuse

Northwestern invites you to be the keynote speaker at the Graduation Ceremony. On what do you give your speech? 
1) The importance of hard work and perseverance 
2) How cool it is to be famous 
3) How their educations were a sham because they didn't take enough Game Dev classes 
4) Make the speech all about yourself and your political positions.

'Your debt is due,' Mr. Monopoly says. Please advertise our new soda drink to your followers. 
1) Advertise it unironically 
2) Advertise it ironically 
3) Refuse to advertise it 
4) Make a counteroffer
Congratulations for figuring out how to be a politician! You win! There's no more content, but you can continue playing. \n1) Continue

Your campaign bus breaks down in the bad part of town in Radiator Springs. What do you do? 
1) Hunker down and wait it out 
2) Find the police station 
3) Scream for help 
4) Steal a car
